author: gartung
body: Noticed the build of tensorflow:tensorflow would fail when invoking protoc because a newer libstdc++ was not found in the environment. Exporting LD_LIBRARY_PATH allowed the shell invoked by bazel to have the correct LD_LIBRARY_PATH set.
title: Tensorflow: export LD_LIBRARY_PATH so protoc.bin command works when generating C and C++ files from proto files.
